movie.title: The One I Love
movie.description_intro: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.
movie.description_full: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.

movies.title: Gantz: O
movies.summary: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.
movies.description_full: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.
movies.synopsis: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.

movies.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
movies.summary: After King Neptune's crown is stolen, SpongeBob and Patrick go on a quest in 6 days to retrieve his crown. On the way SpongeBob and Patrick defeat many evildoers using their brains and bronzes. While this is happening someone is taking over Bikini Bottom and SpongeBob and Patrick must defeat this mastermind.

movies.title: Streamer
movies.summary: Streamer is a compelling character study of one man's search for connection in an unforgiving big city. Creepy, urban, and close to home, directors Jared Bratt and Vincent Pun's first feature film is a psycho-drama for those who dread the heartbreak and horrors of loneliness.
movies.description_full: Streamer is a compelling character study of one man's search for connection in an unforgiving big city. Creepy, urban, and close to home, directors Jared Bratt and Vincent Pun's first feature film is a psycho-drama for those who dread the heartbreak and horrors of loneliness.

movies.title: This Gun for Hire
movies.summary: Hit man Philip Raven, who's kind to children and cats, kills a blackmailer and is paid off by traitor Willard Gates in "hot" money. Meanwhile, pert entertainer Ellen Graham, girlfriend of police Lieut. Crane (who's after Raven) is enlisted by a Senate committee to help investigate Gates. Raven, seeking Gates for revenge, meets Ellen on the train; their relationship gradually evolves from that of killer and potential victim to an uneasy alliance against a common enemy.
